options.content:
This dashboard features a Timeliness computation of products published at the following interfaces for S2 mission:
 - DD DHUS, DAS.

Timeliness is computed from metadata attached to each DD product (Publication Date - Content Date/End (which is the end of sensing)).

Discrepancies are displayed through the following indicators:
 - Percent of products below timeliness threshold;
 - Average timeliness of products;
 - Time series of product displayed against the timeliness threshold;
 - Detailed list of product out of accepted range.

Information is available for each satellite managed by OMCS.

Tips:
 - Annotations are available on time series;
 - Satellite to consider can be selected in the upper bar.
 - Dissemination service to consider can be selected in the upper bar filter named "Dissemination service".

Time reference for this dashboard is : sensing_start_date

Important notice : Tables & timelines can only display up to 10 000 entries. Please make use of filters to narrow down the retrieved data and get a more realistic view.

targets.query: from_sensing_timeliness: [0 TO 43200000000] AND service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service:text}  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service:text}  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service:text}  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service:text}  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

panels.title: NOMINAL - From Sensing to Dissemination over time

targets.query: from_sensing_timeliness: [0 TO 86400000000] AND service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service:text}  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service:text}  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

service_type : DD AND service_id:${dd_service:text}  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:$timeliness AND timeliness:NOMINAL AND from_sensing_timeliness: [43200000000 TO *]
datatake_id:$out_of_timeliness_global

panels.title: Datatakes impacted by out of timeliness products (E2E) (NOMINAL>12H)

targets.query: from_sensing_to_delivery_stop_timeliness:[0 TO 10800000000] AND satellite_unit:$satellite_unit AND mission:$mission
from_sensing_to_delivery_stop_timeliness:* AND satellite_unit:$satellite_unit AND mission:$mission
from_sensing_to_delivery_stop_timeliness: [0 TO 28800000000] AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit}
from_sensing_to_delivery_stop_timeliness:* AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit}
mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit}
from_sensing_to_delivery_stop_timeliness:[0 TO 86400000000] AND satellite_unit:$satellite_unit AND mission:$mission
from_sensing_to_delivery_stop_timeliness:* AND satellite_unit:$satellite_unit AND mission:$mission
mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit}
from_sensing_to_delivery_stop_timeliness: [3600000000 TO *] AND mission:$mission AND satellite_unit:$satellite_unit

panels.title: Downlink impacted by out of timeliness acquisition (From Sensing to Delivery Stop) (> 1h)

options.alias: From sensing to delivery stop timeliness

panels.title: Datatakes impacted by out of timeliness acquisition (From Sensing to Delivery Stop) (> 1h)

targets.query: transfer_timeliness: [0 TO 10800000000] AND service_type : PRIP  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)
service_type : PRIP  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

transfer_timeliness: [0 TO 18000000000] AND service_type : PRIP  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)
service_type : PRIP  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)
service_type : PRIP  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

transfer_timeliness: [0 TO 86400000000] AND service_type : PRIP  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)
service_type : PRIP  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)
service_type : PRIP  AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type}  AND (timeliness:NOMINAL)

service_type : PRIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} 
AND transfer_timeliness: [18000000000 TO *]
datatake_id:$out_of_timeliness_production_datatakes

panels.title: Datatakes impacted by out of timeliness products (From XBIP >5h)

targets.query: from_prip_${dd_service}_timeliness: [0 TO 10800000000] AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL
mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL AND from_prip_${dd_service}_timeliness:*

from_prip_${dd_service}_timeliness: [0 TO 28800000000] AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL
mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL AND from_prip_${dd_service}_timeliness:*
mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL

panels.title: NOMINAL - Timeliness from PRIP over time

targets.query: from_prip_${dd_service}_timeliness: [0 TO 86400000000] AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL
mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL AND from_prip_${dd_service}_timeliness:*
from_prip_${dd_service}_timeliness:* AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL

targets.query: mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND timeliness:NOMINAL AND from_prip_${dd_service}_timeliness: [10800000000 TO *]

panels.title: Datatakes impacted by out of timeliness products (From XBIP) (NRT > 3h ; NTC > 8h)
Dissemination Timeliness (from PRIP to Data Dissemination)

list.definition: {"find":"terms","field":"product_type", "query":"mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite_unit AND product_level:$product_level  AND timeliness: $timeliness"}
list.label: Product Type
list.name: product_type
list.query: {"find":"terms","field":"product_type", "query":"mission: $mission AND satellite_unit : $satellite_unit AND product_level:$product_level  AND timeliness: $timeliness"}

list.definition: {"find":"terms","field":"datatake_id", "query":"service_type : PRIP AND mission:${mission} AND satellite_unit:${satellite_unit} AND product_level:${product_level} AND product_type:${product_type} AND transfer_timeliness: [18000000000 TO *]"}
list.name: out_of_timeliness_production_datatakes
